display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the user a 20% chance for protection from teleportation effects and +3% bonus to defense. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses. You get the set bonuses not marked "(PvP)" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.
